msg: Fix bug with NULL pointer when reference list is empty - fix as suggested by Jesse Pelton <jsp@PKC.com> on 23 March 2005 on security-dev@xml

msg: Update to enable adding of an X509 subject name as a key info

author: milan
msg: Changed scope of importKey() from private to public. It returns key now, instead of void.
